name: Etherym Bottomless Maw
text:
You can banish 1 "Etherym" monster from your GY, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target. An "Etherym" Xyz monster that was Summoned using this card as Xyz material gains this effect.
(Quick Effect) You can detach 2 Xyz material from this card; destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
